title: Fantasy General II: Invasion – Hero Edition – v1.02.12491 + 2 DLCs + Bonuses
body:
Fantasy General II: Invasion – Hero Edition – v1.02.12491 + 2 DLCs + Bonuses


Genres/Tags: Strategy, Wargame, Isometric, 3D, Turn-based
Companies: Owned by Gravity, Slitherine
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI6
Original Size: 2.5 GB
Repack Size: 1.2 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by Gamesdrive, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Fantasy.General.II.Empire.Aflame-CODEX ISO release: codex-fantasy.general.ii.empire.aflame.iso (2,730,262,528 bytes)
  • 2 DLCs (Empire Aflame & Onslaught) are included and activated; Bonuses (OST, Artbook, Worldmap) included by default
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 2.5 to 1.2 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-4 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 2 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Fantasy General II: Invasion is the reimagination of the strategy game classic from the 90s! Armies once again draw battle-lines on the war-torn land of Keldonia, and a new generation of commanders will test their bravery and tactics against each other. Fantasy wargaming is back!

True to the tradition of the original game, Fantasy General II is all about turn-based battles. Lead over 75 different unique unit types, including powerful heroes. Take into consideration terrain, weapons and armour, magical effects, morale, and the balance of forces, make a plan, execute it, and vanquish your enemy, forging your reputation as a savage war-leader.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is NOT backwards compatible with my previous FG2 repack.
